title: why has riot still not looked at kalista for a nerf yet?
body:
i get that she's high skillcap and dependent on a support, but jesus christ. 

she's impossible for supports to itemize against, negates any and all skill shots, has a 10% health magic damage passive that synergizes with every meta support perfectly, has an unlimited stacking e that helps in securing objectives and chunking someone for 15% of their health, and has an ult that saves people from cc, bad decisions, and pretty much everything.

i don't care if her winrate is low, or if she's high skillcap. its only a matter of time before a lot of people master her, abuse her, and then make every single game for everyone toxic
ahem {{champion:64}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:76}}

its like they made this champion FOR runaan's also.
it basically gives her vayne's w with 3+spears on anyone and everyone hit

and wow slowed her ANIMATION. i bet that will stop her from becoming a terror with runaan's, bork, serkers, shiv and IE. at least other full build adcs can still be beat. kalista can get away from damn near EVERYTHING with her hops.

Clearly you don't understand how important the animation is since she's the only champ in the game that cannot cancel theirs.

The longer her animation, the longer it takes for her to hop. The longer it takes for her to hop, the harder it is to kite.

Kalista is a lot more easily locked down now than she was pre-nerf.

The biggest problem with Kalista is that she is immune to the most common form of CC in the game: Slows. Her dashes completely invalidate them.

Easy solution: Have Kalista's dash distance scale with current MS and remove her ability to hop over walls.

I'm with you. Although I think the complaints are somewhat justified, there seems to me to be an excess of QQing on this subject.

I think there's a psychological tendency to react more strongly to flashiness than to actual strength. Kalista's extreme kiting ability is visually very impressive.

I think it's because she's a certainlyT champion. The champs he designs have this horrendous balancing issue where they usually have this one thing that makes them completely infuriating to deal with (Darius's "If you pick a melee I win", Yasuo's double crit passive, and Kalista's passive) but if you removed these aspects to their kits or nerfed them enough to make up for them, you would completely destroy them as they are currently designed.

It's so complex!

Riot doesn't care about players who like playing remotely kiteable champions. Ranged champions can sometimes outplay her so that's all that matters. Getting infinitely kited? Your fault for getting counterpicked. Try not picking a melee next time.
